reviews.review_msg: Halil's lectures and labs ARE a bit dry, but he himself is sweet and gentle. He gave us a ton of bonus points for our final project - dressing up to the presentation, making a video on it, etc. Our 2 quizzes and 1 midterm was worth virtually nothing as most ppl failed it. Just do your work, and you'll get your (easy) marks! He's such a nice guy.

I will NEVER take a class with him again. I'm delaying my graduation so I can avoid him. He's incompetent, rude, insecure, and useless. Doesn't respect students or their time at all. Frequently tries to run well over half an hour past lab end time. Randomly changes due dates on the day things are due. Doesn't explain assignments or answer questions
